casebody.data:
No. 387,

Misc.

Miller v. Pate, Warden. Willard J. Lassers for petitioner. William G. Clark, Attorney General of Illinois, and Richard A. Michael, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent. Maurice Rosenfield and William R. Ming, Jr., for Radio Station WAIT (Chicago) et al., as amici curiae, in support of the petition.

C. A. 7th Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
